SEARCH

Package manager

package manager
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CurrentMenuController
    Manager view for current menu - see items, tweak price/stock, toggle active, add/delete items.
    CurrentMenuController.ItemView
    Simple item view model for the current menu table (id, name, stock, cost, category, active).
    ItemController
    Item analytics page - pick an item, show sales charts and restock history.
    ItemController.RestockRowView
    Row model for the restocks table (quantity and date string).
    ItemRecommendation
    Tiny data holder for recommendation rows - item name, note, stock, price.
    LandingController
    Manager landing hub - shows time/date and links out to sections.
    RecommendationsController
    Recommendations page - shows suggestions and lets you tweak price inline.
    ReportsController
    Reports dashboard - regular report table, X-report (live day), and Z-report run.
    ReportsController.ReportRow
    Row model for the regular report table: name, stock, price, suggested qty/date.
    ReportsController.XReportRow
    Row model for the X-report: itemName, salesCount, revenue, avgPrice, lastSaleTime.
